subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The victory was the first for the Americans after five consecutive losses and their best result since they beat Ghana in their opening match at last year’s World Cup.
snippet: The victory was the first for the Americans after five consecutive losses and their best result since they beat Ghana in their opening match at last year’s World Cup.
